summary: Lorecraft plugin for Bandolier - Bags and Pouches by Dragten
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959]Lorecraft 4.0+[/url]
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16438]Bandolier - Bags and Pouches 1.101[/url]

Lorecraft plugin made for Lorecraft 4.0+ and Bandolier - Bags and Pouches 1.101.
This adds individual books for each type of bags. All of the different sides\' bags are in the same books. The dark leather and buckles don\'t show up unless the plan that uses them is activated. All Dark Brotherhood items are on the same book.

==================
Installation:
==================

1) Install Bandolier - Bags and Pouches 1.101
2) Install this Lorecraft plugin
3) Load this plugin\'s .esp after dr_bandolier.esp


==================
Changelog:
==================

5/28/2012 - Initial Release
6/21/2021 - 1.1 release, updated for new items in Bandolier - Bags and Pouches v1.101


==================
Credits:
==================

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to InsanitySorrow for the ReadMe Generator this ReadMe is based on.
Thanks to Dragten for his bags mod.
Thanks to ArcaneSmith for Lorecraft.


==================
Tools Used:
==================

ReadMe Generator

Creation Kit
TESVSnip
author: Ganoran

files.name: Lorecraft - Bandolier
files.changelogHtml:
Added books for new items.
Renamed books for better sorting; all non- dark/pale books are now prefixed with "leather".
Changed script for dark brotherhood bandolier note to lorecraft script. You can use it turn on/off these recipes. Also renamed it to fit with the rest of the books.
Prices of all books changed to 50, except the large bandolier books which remain at 100 and the dark brotherhood note which remains at 90.
